snippet.title: Quote For The Day
snippet.description:
Quote For The Day
11 Nov 2012 by Andrew Sullivan on The Dish dish.andrewsullivan.com/2012/11/11/q-1-3/
"Poetry should be written the way adultery is committed: on the run, on the sly, during the time not accounted for. And then you come home, as if nothing ever happened," - Vera Pavlova.
Topics: The Dish

snippet.title: "Scales"
snippet.description:
"Scales"
7 Jun 2012 by dougwarn on At the Center, Stillness stillnessatthecenter.wordpress.com/2012/06/07/scales/
"Scales. In one pan is joy. In the other, sorrow. Sorrow is heavier. Therefore joy Rises higher." – Vera Pavlova
Topics: Poetry, Thoughts, musings, Contemplation, Joy, Sorrow, vera pavlova
